I love that my job allows me to help animals in need.
i am obsessed with my dog.
my desire is to becom a fashion designer.

content.text: Morning! What's your favorite thing to do in the morning?
I like to go for a walk, even if it's just around the block. It helps me wake up and clear my head.
I do that too, but I usually read my favorite comic books.
I love comics! What are your favorites?
I love anything by Alan Moore, but I'm also a big fan of Grant Morrison and Neil Gaiman.
I've read some of Moore's stuff, but I haven't read anything by Morrison or Gaiman. I'll have to check them out!
You definitely should! They're some of the best comic book writers out there.
I'm excited to check them out! What kind of work do you do?
I'm a fashion designer. I love my job, but it can be a lot of work.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a fashion designer.
It's a lot of fun, but it's also a lot of hard work.
I'm sure it is, but I think it would be worth it.
It is! I love being able to create something new and beautiful.
That's amazing! I'm sure you're very talented.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
I do! You should be proud of your work.
I am! It's something that I'm really passionate about.
That's great! I'm glad you have something that you're so passionate about.
